General.Name: Enogia SAS
General.Description: Enogia SAS designs, manufactures, and sells micro-turbomachines France. The company develops Organic Rankine Cycle (ORC) systems that converts heat into electricity. It also offers air compressors for hydrogen fuel cells. The company's products are used in industry, maritime, generator sets, and geothermal energy applications. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Marseille, France.
